ygData.subject: Re: hail and well met
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nor worrying about the slightest pinprick interrupting your spell.  We have it pretty good folks - play a caster for a bit and you ll see that it s nowhere
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 28 Jul 1999, scott brisko wrote:
> > The only other class I like near as much as a Bard is the Cleric class. I
> > thoroughly enjoyed that class as well. Magic & Fighting - but with the
> mana
> > to worry about.
>
> And not having to worry about standing still to cast.

Nor worrying about the slightest pinprick interrupting your
spell. We have it pretty good folks - play a caster for a bit
and you'll see that it's nowhere easy as it looks. The only
casters who have it easy are the kill stealers, because they
are basically getting experience and loot for taking no risk.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
